edu.amc.sakai.user

Class SimpleLdapConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.amc.sakai.user.SimpleLdapConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LdapConnectionManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoolingLdapConnectionManager

    public class SimpleLdapConnectionManager
extends Object
implements LdapConnectionManager
    Allocates connected, constrained, and optionally bound and secure LDAPConnections
    Author:
    Dan McCallum, Unicon Inc, John Lewis, Unicon Inc
    See Also:
    LdapConnectionManagerConfig

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a connected LDAPConnection
        Throws:

                                                String pw)
                                                  throws com.novell.ldap.LDAPException
        Retrieve a bound LDAPConnection using the indicated credentials
        Specified by:
        getBoundConnection in interface LdapConnectionManager
        Parameters:
        dn - the distringuished name for binding
        pw - the password for binding

        com.novell.ldap.LDAPException - if the LDAPConnection allocation fails

      • returnConnection

        public void returnConnection(com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection conn)
        Return an LDAPConnection. This can allow for connections to be pooled instead of just destroyed.
        Specified by:
        returnConnection in interface LdapConnectionManager
        Parameters:
        conn - an LDAPConnection that you no longer need

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(LdapConnectionManagerConfig config)
        Assign the LDAPConnection management configuration. Should typically be invoked once and followed by a call to init().
        Specified by:
        setConfig in interface LdapConnectionManager
        Parameters:
        config - a reference to a LdapConnectionManagerConfig. Should be cacheable without defensive copying.

      • getConfig

        public LdapConnectionManagerConfig getConfig()
        Retrieve the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig.
        Specified by:
        getConfig in interface LdapConnectionManager
        Returns:
        the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig, if any

      • initKeystorePassword

        protected void initKeystorePassword()
        Caches a keystore password as a system property. No-op if the KEYSTORE_PASSWORD_SYS_PROP_KEY system property has a non-null value. Otherwise caches the keystore password from the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig.
        Parameters:
        config -
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if a non-null keystore password cannot be resolved

      • initKeystoreLocation

        protected void initKeystoreLocation()
        Caches a keystore location as a system property. No-op if the KEYSTORE_LOCATION_SYS_PROP_KEY system property has a non-null value. Otherwise caches the keystore location from the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig.
        Parameters:
        config -
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if a non-null keystore location cannot be resolved

      • applyConstraints

        protected void applyConstraints(com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection conn)
        Applies LDAPConstraints to the specified LDAPConnection. Implemented to assign timeLimit and referralFollowing constraint values retrieved from the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig.
        Parameters:
        conn -

      • connect

        protected void connect(com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection conn)
                throws com.novell.ldap.LDAPException
        Connects the specified LDAPConnection to the currently configured host and port.
        Parameters:
        conn - an LDAPConnection
        Throws:
        com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection - if the connect attempt fails
        com.novell.ldap.LDAPException
